--- title: Plotting keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "Plotting utilities" ---
{% raw %}

highlight_edges[source]

highlight_edges(G, edges, pos=None, node_size=300, ax=None)

Draws the graph G with edges in edges drawn in red, the ax object is returned.

heatmap[source]

heatmap(df, x, y, hue, xbins=15, ybins=15, xlim=None, ylim=None, vlim=None, bin_numbers=False, bin_cutoff=1, rounding=3, ax=None, cbar=True, estimator='mean', square=False, robust=False)

Plots a heatmap binning the df data based on columns x and y.
